originalText.text:
From the very beginning, both Robert Greenstein and Bart Pittari displayed a high level of professionalism and expertise in handling personal injury cases. They were thorough in gathering all the necessary details and evidence pertaining to my case, ensuring that no stone was left unturned. Their attention to detail and commitment to seeking justice for their clients was truly commendable.

Throughout the entire process, I felt supported and well-informed. Robert and Bart were always available to address any questions or concerns I had, providing timely updates and advice. Their excellent communication skills helped alleviate much of the stress and uncertainty that often accompanies legal proceedings. I’m incredibly grateful for the exceptional service provided by Robert Greenstein and Bart Pittari. They not only helped me recover from my injuries but also made the entire process much more manageable.

I would not hesitate to recommend Robert Greenstein and Bart Pittari Personal Injury Attorney to anyone in need of legal representation. Their dedication to their clients and their ability to navigate complex legal matters are truly unmatched. If I ever require legal assistance in the future, I will undoubtedly return to them.

- Kimberline B.

originalText.text: So far I have nothing but good thing to say about the law firm of Greenstein & Milbauer. The staff are excellent and as a client your treated with respect. Five Star rating here!

text.text: So far I have nothing but good thing to say about the law firm of Greenstein & Milbauer. The staff are excellent and as a client your treated with respect. Five Star rating here!

originalText.text: My experiences with Bart Pittari and Val Hernandez at Greenstein & Milbauer, LLP has been very professional.  They showed compassion and understanding for me during my time of need.  Their knowledge and constant communication was very helpful and appreciated.  I would definitely recommend this firm.

text.text: My experiences with Bart Pittari and Val Hernandez at Greenstein & Milbauer, LLP has been very professional.  They showed compassion and understanding for me during my time of need.  Their knowledge and constant communication was very helpful and appreciated.  I would definitely recommend this firm.

originalText.text: I wish I could give a six star review these people have been in constant contact with me throughout my whole case, very knowledgeable and friendly staff. They are always available to talk. If you have any questions, they had a good relationship with the defendants insurance company, and was able to settle my case in a rapid and fair manner, they got me a amount I was happy with. Would definitely recommend to any of my friends and family, and it was a pleasure dealing with Seth Milbauer And Jake Berkowitz. Great team

originalText.text: I had a wonderful experience with Greenstein & Milbauer representing me with my motor vehicle accident. They provided me with amazing communication. I would highly recommend them to anyone needing representation from an attorney. They listened and provided me with recommendations to my medical needs.
